name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Holoib: Build interactive demos in minutes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Build interactive demos in seconds with Holoib.

Holoib allows you to easily create interactive product or sales demos by capturing your screen. It captures screen with interactions and generates interactive demos. You can customize the demo by adjusting the hotspot position, tooltip text, and colors. Afterward, you can share it anywhere or embed it into your existing workflows.

To get started, install the Holoib extension. Begin recording by simply clicking on it, and stop the recording when you're finished. Holoib instantly creates the demo from your screen capture.

Holoib is designed to cater to the needs of product marketers, marketers, sales professionals, solution engineers, customer success representatives, or any individual seeking to effortlessly share interactive demos.
